title: If ATC is decreasing, MC is below ATC

content.question: If a firm's average total cost decreases as the firm increases its output, the firm's marginal cost must be

choices.label: greater than the average variable cost
less than the average fixed cost
less than the average total cost

content.answer: less than the average total cost
